function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential spread of contagious diseases due to community-based metadata standardization for clinical and experimental studies.","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and outbreak in the community.","Mitigation":"Implement strict data privacy and security measures to protect sensitive health information.","Technologies":"Secure data storage and encryption technologies.","People":"Community members participating in CIDO development and applications.","Owner":"Data management and cybersecurity experts."}]}
